assignment.title: Evaluate an Existing Agentic AI System
assignment.objective: Apply both quantitative and qualitative evaluation methods to an existing AI system.
expectedCapabilities: Identify appropriate metrics for AI evaluation
assignment.submissionInstructions: Submit a detailed report including metrics chosen, methods of evaluation, and your analysis on the system's performance.

tasks.title: Analyze User Feedback
tasks.description: Gather user feedback on the AI system's usability and efficiency, documenting key themes.

steps.title: Select an AI System
steps.description: Choose an AI system for evaluation, either from previous lessons or an external source.

steps.title: Define Evaluation Metrics
steps.description: Identify suitable quantitative and qualitative metrics based on the system's purpose.

steps.title: Conduct the Evaluation
steps.description: Using the defined metrics, evaluate the chosen AI system. Document findings with evidence.

checkForUnderstanding.question: Which metric is suitable for evaluating AI's speed?
Why is ethical compliance considered in evaluations?
What purpose do feedback loops serve?

subsections.title: Introduction to Evaluation Criteria for AI Systems
subsections.content: Evaluating AI systems requires a comprehensive understanding of both qualitative and quantitative metrics. This subsection introduces how Agentic AI systems differ from other AI systems, focusing on their autonomous decision-making capability and interaction with users.

quizzes.question: What makes Agentic AI systems unique in evaluation?

subsections.title: Quantitative Metrics for AI Performance
subsections.content:
Quantitative metrics are essential for assessing the performance of Agentic AI systems. Metrics include:
- Accuracy: How well the AI performs tasks compared to a benchmark.
- Efficiency: Time and resources consumed by the AI.
- Scalability: How the AI performance changes with increased data or complexity.

quizzes.question: Which of the following is a quantitative metric?

subsections.title: Qualitative Aspects of AI Evaluation
subsections.content:
Qualitative aspects focus on more subjective measures and can include:
- User Satisfaction: Measuring how users perceive the AI's effectiveness and usability.
- Ethical Considerations: Ensuring the AI operates within ethical and legal boundaries.
- Transparency: How well users can understand the AI's decision-making processes.

quizzes.question: What is a qualitative measure in AI evaluation?

subsections.title: Practical Evaluation Techniques
subsections.content:
This subsection provides a hands-on approach to evaluating AI systems:
- Setting benchmarks for comparison.
- Conducting A/B tests to determine effective interventions.
- Utilizing feedback loops for continuous improvement.

quizzes.question: Which technique can be used for real-time evaluation?
